result.execSummary:
The defendant Shauna L Heim was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Huber / work release granted for any purpose the Law allows.

miscConds.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.
All financials same as noted above.  MUST SUBMIT DNA SAMPLE.

Any Counseling as recommended by Agent and follow-through. 
Take all medication as prescribed. 
AODA and follow-through.  
Follow ALL rules of school or placement (home).  
Agent to approve contact w/parents.
Expungement granted IF all fines are paid w/i 1 year.  No new criminal charges AND no ordinances for possession.

timeConds.notes:
Huber granted.
3 days credit time served

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shauna L Heim

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Shauna L Heim
Current: N8258 Cooper Rd, Oneida, WI 54155 United States  (Effective: 04-13-2016)
Prior: W3466 Hwy 156, Pulaski, WI 54162
Shawano County DNA Proof of Submission - DNA obtained.
DNA Proof of Submission - signed by DE

Defendant Shauna L Heim in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Defendant Shauna L Heim in custody.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea Questionnaire filed w/NC Plea.  Court reviews rights, charges & penalties w/DE.  Atty Haacke - DE does not have a place to reside at this time.  Court accepts waiver, plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty.  ADA White cites DE's history, makes recommendation.  Atty Haacke - DE has agreed to cooperate w/probation, argues jail time, requests expungement.  ADA White argues against expungement.  DE has letter of apology for grandmother.  Court pronounces sentence. Appeal rights given to DE.  Court will grant expungement after 1 year if fine paid in full and on time, No new criminal charges, no ordinances relating to posession.
Absolute sobriety.  No contact with CD unless CD requests it be lifted.  Court would need to approve by court order where defendant would live.

Defendant Shauna L Heim appeared by video means without an attorney. Prosecuting Atty Catharine Denise White appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 1, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
